app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Voice Monitor Recorder MOREC
app_description: MOREC is a high quality voice recorder. You can listen to the sound while recording using your microphone and headphones and you can add audio effects in realtime so that it s really useful for vocal practice and ASMR recordings. MOREC is constituted of 8 sections below. MICROPHONE GAIN PITCH SHIFTER HIGH PASS FILTER LOW PASS FILTER ECHO REVERB DISTORTION STEREO DOUBLER Each section has a button and a slider which can make itself on off and manipulate the parameter. It s really useful to practice of singing speech training and so on. Supported outputs: Headphones Bluetooth Airplay AirPods AirPods Pro AirPods Max Background listening record supported. WAV file export supported.
